title: The Wind beneath their wings
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Royal Australian Air Force
abstract: A quiet country girl's adventure in the Air Force.
description: As a shy country girl, Gwen joined the Air Force when she was 18 years old and was posted at several locations around Victoria.   Becoming a dressmaker after she was discharged from the army, Gwen married and lived life on a farm where she cultivated brown sheep, Shetland ponies and goats.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002737; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]; Active; 2011
